summary: REQ-1 (remove 'Tjenester' from nav menu) is fully implemented in Header.tsx. REQ-2 (update Internet Identity description) is partially implemented — PublicSubmissionForm.tsx is updated, but LandingPage.tsx and ClientPortal.tsx are not confirmed to have been updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Internet Identity description text in LandingPage.tsx and ClientPortal.tsx (in addition to PublicSubmissionForm.tsx) to reflect Internet Identity 2.0 capabilities: passkeys, Google, Apple, and Microsoft sign-in.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows PublicSubmissionForm.tsx was updated with II 2.0 description. The file summaries for LandingPage.tsx and ClientPortal.tsx do not mention any Internet Identity description update — LandingPage.tsx summary only mentions hero section and contact section changes, and ClientPortal.tsx summary only mentions mobile navigation improvements. No evidence of II 2.0 description updates in those files.
